item.title: Heritage Church CPC
item.description:
Psalm 103, KJV

**Upload date 7/3/17

June sure went by quickly for our family, and our 4 weeks learning Psalm 103 has been a blessing to me and the kids. We’re all thankful for the Centerville String Quartet and Scott Young as they helped us settle this text in our memory, and I daresay our affections, in a great musical setting. I thoroughly enjoyed recording it and am looking forward to tackling Psalm 139 in July.

To round out the month, here is the final Version 5 track of Psalm 103, with no narration at all but only the Beethoven Piano Trio, Op. 97.

See if you can say it along with the music!

Have any experiences or tips to share about using this track? Please share in the comments down below!
